outline:
1. delight, pleasure
    1. delight
    2. desire, longing
    3. the good pleasure
    4. that in which one takes delight
kjv_def: acceptable, delight(-some), desire, things desired, matter, pleasant(-ure), purpose, willingly.
strongs_def: pleasure; hence (abstractly) desire; concretely, a valuable thing; hence (by extension) a matter (as something in mind)
